BaseBody - Class in Environment
The Class BaseBody is the "physical" representation of a base tile in an environment.
BaseBody(int, int, int) - Constructor for class Environment.BaseBody
Instantiates a new base body.
baseColor - Variable in class Environment.BasePosition
The base color.
BasePheromoneColor(int) - Static method in class Tools.ColorUtils
Compute the color of a base pheromone given the life expectancy of the pheromone.
BasePosition - Class in Environment
The Class BasePosition is a representation of a base for the purpose of being used by a GUI.
